href="https://sephora-cdn.inside-graph.com/custom/1-customGeneralInside.css?1744326261903"><script type="text/javascript" data-id="z1s-tg-z1_codeLibraryTag_828">function z1_codeLibraryTag_828(){ try{
(function (z) {
    try {
        let QA = false;
        QA = localStorage.getItem("z1_qa") ? localStorage.getItem("z1_qa") === 'true' : false;
        // QA = true; //just for testing purpose
        // if (!QA) {
        //     return false;
        // }

        console.log("%c[Z1]", "color:green", "Z1 tag ready | QA:", QA);
        window.z1log = function () {
            if (!QA) {
                return () => { };
            }
            if (!window.console || !console.log) {
                return () => { };
            }
            //return Function.prototype.bind.call(console.log, console);
            return console.log.bind(window.console, "%c[Z1]: ", "color:green");
        }();

        //private methods
        const hookGtmDataLayer = (dlVarName) => {
            let dataLayer = window[dlVarName] || [];
            let previousLength = 0;
            //dataLayer.length;
            let intervalId;
            let maxFireEvents = 20;
            function checkForNewItems() {
                if (dataLayer.length > previousLength) {
                    // New items have been added
                    try {
                        let loopLength = dataLayer.length <= previousLength + maxFireEvents ? dataLayer.length : previousLength + maxFireEvents;

                        for (let i = previousLength; i < loopLength; i++) {
                            if (i < dataLayer.length) {

                                // Create and dispatch a custom event for each new item
                                const pushEvent = new CustomEvent("z1_datalayerpush", {
                                    detail: {
                                        eventData: dataLayer[i],
                                        dlIndex: i,
                                    },
                                });
                                window.dispatchEvent(pushEvent);
                            }
                        }
                        previousLength = loopLength;
                        // Update the previous length to current
                    } catch (e) {
                        console.log("Error processing new dataLayer items:", e);
                    }
                }
            }

            // Start polling at regular intervals (e.g., every 500ms)
            intervalId = setInterval(checkForNewItems, 500);

            // Cleanup function to clear the interval
            function cleanup() {
                if (intervalId) {
                    clearInterval(intervalId);
                    intervalId = null;
                }
            }

            // Listen for the unload event to clear the interval when the page is unloaded
            window.addEventListener('beforeunload', cleanup);
            window.addEventListener('unload', cleanup);
        };

        const hookTeamliumDataLayer = () => {
            if (window.utag && window.utag.track) {
                const originalutagPush = window.utag.track;

                // Prevent multiple override of the .push() method
                if (z.isTealiumListenerAttached) {
                    return;
                }

                z.isTealiumListenerAttached = true;
                window.utag.track = function (...args) {
                    const pushEvent = new CustomEvent('utagdatalayerpush', {
                        detail: args[0]
                    });
                    window.dispatchEvent(pushEvent);
                    originalutagPush(...args);
                };
            }
            else {
                z1log("hookTeamliumDataLayer is not executed.");
            }
        };

        const hookDigitalData = (dlVarName) => {
            let digitalData = window[dlVarName] || [];
            digitalData = digitalData ? digitalData.event : [];
            console.log("hookDigitalData digitalData : ", digitalData)
            let previousLength = 0;
            //digitalData.length;
            let intervalId;
            let maxFireEvents = 20;
            function checkForNewItems() {
                if (digitalData.length > previousLength) {
                    // New items have been added
                    try {
                        let loopLength = digitalData.length <= previousLength + maxFireEvents ? digitalData.length : previousLength + maxFireEvents;

                        for (let i = previousLength; i < loopLength; i++) {
                            if (i < digitalData.length) {

                                // Create and dispatch a custom event for each new item
                                const pushEvent = new CustomEvent("z1_digitaldatapush", {
                                    detail: {
                                        eventData: digitalData[i],
                                        dlIndex: i,
                                    },
                                });
                                window.dispatchEvent(pushEvent);
                            }
                        }
                        previousLength = loopLength;
                        // Update the previous length to current
                    } catch (e) {
                        console.log("Error processing new digitalData items:", e);
                    }
                }
            }

            // Start polling at regular intervals (e.g., every 500ms)
            intervalId = setInterval(checkForNewItems, 500);

            // Cleanup function to clear the interval
            function cleanup() {
                if (intervalId) {
                    clearInterval(intervalId);
                    intervalId = null;
                }
            }

            // Listen for the unload event to clear the interval when the page is unloaded
            window.addEventListener('beforeunload', cleanup);
            window.addEventListener('unload', cleanup);
        };

        //Classes
        z.z1WidgetDivId = "z1widget";
        z.Util = function () {
            let self = this;
            this.debounce = (func, timeout = 300) => {
                let timer;
                return (...args) => {
                    clearTimeout(timer);
                    timer = setTimeout(() => { func.apply(this, args); }, timeout);
                };
            };

            this.capitalize = (sentence) => {
                sentence = sentence.trim();
                let output = "";
                sentence.split(" ").forEach((item, index) => {
                    output += item.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + item.substr(1) + " ";
                });
                return output.trim();
            }

            this.clearLocalStorageItems = () => {
                localStorage.removeItem("z1_modifiedCart");
                localStorage.removeItem("z1_modifiedSKU");
                localStorage.removeItem("z1_removedItemFromCart");
                localStorage.removeItem("z1_product");
            }

            this.transformObject = (inObject, fieldMap) => {
                let outObject = {};
                for (let key in fieldMap) {
                    outObject[key] = "";
                    if (fieldMap[key] !== "" && fieldMap[key] in inObject) {
                        outObject[key] = inObject[fieldMap[key]];
                    }
                }
                return outObject;
            };

            this.transformObjectArray = (objArray, transformMap) => {
                let result = [];
                const util = new z1taglib.Util();
                for (let i in objArray) {
                    if (typeof (objArray[i]) !== 'undefined') {
                        result.push(util.transformObject(objArray[i], transformMap));
                    }
                }
                return result;
            }

            this.addDecimalPoint = (num, decimalPlaces = 2) => {
                return (num / 100).toFixed(decimalPlaces);
            }

            this.isValid = function (value) {

                if (value == "null" || value == "undefined" || value == null || value == undefined) {
                    return false;
                }
                return true;
            };
            this.getCookie = function (name) {
                var value = document.cookie.match(new RegExp('(^| )' + name + '=([^;]+)'));
                if (value != null) z1log("Cookie ", value);
                return (value != null) ? decodeURIComponent(value[2]) : null;
            };
            this.validateForNotNull = function (obj) {
                if (!(obj === undefined) && obj != null && obj != 'null' && obj.toString().length != 0) {
                    return true;
                }
                return false;
            };
            this.convertObjectValuesToString = function (o) {

                Object.keys(o).forEach(k => {
                    if (typeof o[k] === 'object') {
                        return this.convertObjectValuesToString(o[k]);
                    }

                    o[k] = '' + o[k];
                });

                return o;

            };
            this.getAllUrlParams = (url) => {
                // get query string from url (optional) or window
                var queryString = url ? url.split('?')[1] : window.location.search.slice(1);
                var obj = {};
                if (queryString) {
                    queryString = queryString.split('#')[0];
                    var arr = queryString.split('&');
                    for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
                        var a = arr[i].split('=');
                        var paramName = a[0];
                        var paramValue = typeof (a[1]) === 'undefined' ? true : a[1];
                        paramName = paramName.toLowerCase();
                        if (typeof paramValue === 'string') paramValue = paramValue.toLowerCase();
                        if (paramName.match(/\[(\d+)?\]$/)) {
                            var key = paramName.replace(/\[(\d+)?\]/, '');
                            if (!obj[key]) obj[key] = [];
                            if (paramName.match(/\[\d+\]$/)) {
                                var index = /\[(\d+)\]/.exec(paramName)[1];
                                obj[key][index] = paramValue;
                            } else {
                                obj[key].push(paramValue);
                            }
                        } else {
                            if (!obj[paramName]) {
                                obj[paramName] = paramValue;
                            } else if (obj[paramName] && typeof obj[paramName] === 'string') {
                                obj[paramName] = [obj[paramName]];
                                obj[paramName].push(paramValue);
                            } else {
                                obj[paramName].push(paramValue);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                return obj;
            };
            this.pushEvent = function (eventName, eventParameters) {
                if (typeof eventParameters == "string") {
                    eventParameters = JSON.parse(eventParameters);
                }
                if (window.ZineOne) {
                    ZineOne.pushEvent(eventName, eventParameters);
                }
                z1log("Sending Event ", eventName, eventParameters);
            };

            this.getReferrer = function () {
                let referrerInfo = localStorage.getItem("z1_referrerInfo") ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("z1_referrerInfo")) : { 'referrerTime': 0, 'referrer': '' };
                let currentTime = new Date().getTime();
                if ((currentTime - Number(referrerInfo.referrerTime) > 1800000) || !referrerInfo.referrer) {
                    referrerInfo.referrer = document.referrer;
                    // z1log('referrerInfo', referrerInfo);
                }
                referrerInfo.referrerTime = currentTime;
                localStorage.setItem("z1_referrerInfo", JSON.stringify(referrerInfo));
                return referrerInfo.referrer;
            };

            this.handleRawData = (rawData) => {
                try {
                    // z1log("rawData...", rawData);
                    rawData = rawData.replace(/(\r\n|\n|\r|\t)/gm, " ");
                    let z1Response = JSON.parse(rawData);

                    z1log("z1Response...", z1Response);
                    let raw_data_event = new CustomEvent("onZ1RawData", {
                        detail: z1Response,
                    });
                    window.dispatchEvent(raw_data_event);
                }
                catch (err) {
                    z1log("Error in handleRawData: ", err);
                }
            };

            this.attachZ1RawDataHandler = function () {
                // z1log("call attachZ1RawDataHandler  ");
                const z1Widgets = ZineOne.getZ1Widget();
                // z1log("z1Widgets ", z1Widgets);
                z1Widgets.registerWidgetHandler("raw", self.handleRawData);
            };

            this.getDeviceType = () => {
                const isMobile = function (a) {
                    return /mobile|ip(hone|od|ad)|android|blackBerry|iemobile|kindle|netfront|silk-accelerated|(hpw|web)os|fennec|minimo|opera m(obi|ini)|blazer|dolfin|dolphin|skyfire|zune/.test(
                        a
                    );
                };
                const isTablet = function (a) {
                    return (
                        /ipad/.test(a) ||
                        (/android/.test(a) && /(chrome\/[.0-9]* (?!mobile))/.test(a)) ||
                        (-1 < a.indexOf("mozilla/5.0") &&
                            -1 < a.indexOf("android ") &&
                            -1 < a.indexOf("applewebkit") &&
                            /(?!mobile)/.test(a) &&
                            !(-1 < a.indexOf("chrome")))
                    );
                };
                if (isMobile(navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase())) {
                    var a = "phone";
                    isTablet(navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase()) && (a = "tablet");
                } else a = "desktop";
                return a;
            };

            this.generateContentWidget = (parentDiv) => {
                var notifyDiv = parentDiv || document.body;
                if (notifyDiv) {
                    let existingDiv = document.getElementById(z.z1WidgetDivId);
                    if (existingDiv) {
                        existingDiv.remove();
                    }
                    var z1Div = document.createElement("div");
                    z1Div.setAttribute("data-zineone-widget", "z1_content_widget");
                    z1Div.setAttribute("id", z.z1WidgetDivId);

                    notifyDiv.appendChild(z1Div);
                }
            };

            this.getLastSessionId = () => {
                let sessionId = localStorage.getItem("z1_lastSessionId");
                return sessionId;
            };
            this.setLastSessionId = (sessionId) => {
                localStorage.setItem("z1_lastSessionId", sessionId);
            };

            this.setIntervalX = (callback, delay, repetitions, conditionCheck) => {
                let x = 0;
                let intervalID = window.setInterval(function () {
                    console.log("checking...");
                    if (conditionCheck()) {
                        callback();
                        window.clearInterval(intervalID);
                    }
                    if (++x === repetitions) {
                        window.clearInterval(intervalID);
                    }
                }, delay);
            };
            this.isElement = (o) => {
                return typeof HTMLElement === "object"
                    ? o instanceof HTMLElement //DOM2
                    : o &&
                    typeof o === "object" &&
                    o !== null &&
                    o.nodeType === 1 &&
                    typeof o.nodeName === "string";
            };

            this.resetSession = (callback) => {
                throw "[ERROR] resetSession(callback) has been deprecated. Please use resetSessionByTag(tagName, callback).";
                // Deprecated
                let lastSessionId = this.getLastSessionId();
                let currSessionId = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("z1_sessionData"));
                if (this.isValid(lastSessionId)) {
                    if (currSessionId && currSessionId.z1_session_id !== lastSessionId) {
                        this.setLastSessionId(currSessionId.z1_session_id);
                        callback();
                    }
                } else {
                    this.setLastSessionId(currSessionId.z1_session_id);
                }
            };

            this.getSessionResetCallback = (tagName, callback) => {
                z.sessionResetCallbacks = z.sessionResetCallbacks || {};
                if (z.sessionResetCallbacks[tagName]) {
                    return z.sessionResetCallbacks[tagName];
                }

                let self = this;
                z.sessionResetCallbacks[tagName] = function () {
                    self.resetSessionByTag(tagName, callback);
                };
                return z.sessionResetCallbacks[tagName];
            };

            this.isTagNameRegistered = (tagName) => {
                z.registeredTagNames = z.registeredTagNames || [];
                if (!tagName) {
                    return false;
                }
                return (z.registeredTagNames && z.registeredTagNames.includes(tagName));
            };

            this.registerTagName = (tagName) => {
                z.registeredTagNames = z.registeredTagNames || [];
                if (!tagName) {
                    throw "[ERROR] tagName is invalid. Please provide a correct tagName.";
                }

                if (this.isTagNameRegistered(tagName)) {
                    throw "[ERROR] tagName=" + tagName + " has already been registered. Please provide a unique name for each tag.";
                }
                z.registeredTagNames.push(tagName);
            };

            this.resetSessionByTag = (...args) => {
                if (!args || (args && args.length < 2)) {
                    throw "[ERROR] resetSessionByTag(tagName, callback) requires 2 parameters, got " + (args ? args.length : 0);
                }

                if (typeof (args[0]) !== "string") {
                    throw "[ERROR] The first argument to resetSessionByTag(tagName, callback) needs to be a string.";
                }

                if (typeof (args[1]) !== "function") {
                    throw "[ERROR] The second argument to resetSessionByTag(tagName, callback) needs to be a function.";
                }

                let tagName = args[0];
                let callback = args[1];

                if (!tagName) {
                    throw "[ERROR] tagName is invalid. Please provide a valid tagName.";
                }

                if (!this.isTagNameRegistered(tagName)) {
                    throw "[ERROR] tagName=" + tagName + " is not registered. " +
                    "Please register the tagName by calling registerTagName(tagName) prior to calling resetSessionByTag(tagName, callback).";
                }

                let localStorageKey = "z1_" + tagName + "_lastSessionId";
                let lastSessionId = localStorage.getItem(localStorageKey);

                let currSessionId = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("z1_sessionData"));
                if (this.isValid(lastSessionId)) {
                    if (currSessionId && currSessionId.z1_session_id !== lastSessionId) {
                        localStorage.setItem(localStorageKey, currSessionId.z1_session_id);
                        callback();
                    }
                } else {
                    localStorage.setItem(localStorageKey, currSessionId.z1_session_id);
                    callback();
                }

                let performSessionReset = this.getSessionResetCallback(tagName, callback);
                window.removeEventListener("z1_check_new_session", performSessionReset);
                window.addEventListener("z1_check_new_session", performSessionReset);
            };

            this.msToTime = (duration) => {
                var milliseconds = parseInt((duration % 1000) / 100),
                    seconds = Math.floor((duration / 1000) % 60),
                    minutes = Math.floor((duration / (1000 * 60)) % 60),
                    hours = Math.floor((duration / (1000 * 60 * 60)) % 24);

                hours = hours < 10 ? "0" + hours : hours;
                minutes = minutes < 10 ? "0" + minutes : minutes;
                seconds = seconds < 10 ? "0" + seconds : seconds;
                // z1log("msToTime ", hours, minutes, seconds);
                if (hours === "00") {
                    return minutes + ":" + seconds;
                }
                return hours + ":" + minutes + ":" + seconds;
            };

            this.changeInputValue = (input, value) => {
                let nativeInputValueSetter = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(
                    window.HTMLInputElement.prototype,
                    "value"
                ).set;
                nativeInputValueSetter.call(input, value);

                let inputEvent = new Event("input", { bubbles: true });
                input.dispatchEvent(inputEvent);
            };

            this.cyrb53 = function (str, seed = 0) {
                let h1 = 0xdeadbeef ^ seed, h2 = 0x41c6ce57 ^ seed;
                for (let i = 0, ch; i < str.length; i++) {
                    ch = str.charCodeAt(i);
                    h1 = Math.imul(h1 ^ ch, 2654435761);
                    h2 = Math.imul(h2 ^ ch, 1597334677);
                }
                h1 = Math.imul(h1 ^ (h1 >>> 16), 2246822507) ^ Math.imul(h2 ^ (h2 >>> 13), 3266489909);
                h2 = Math.imul(h2 ^ (h2 >>> 16), 2246822507) ^ Math.imul(h1 ^ (h1 >>> 13), 3266489909);
                return 4294967296 * (2097151 & h2) + (h1 >>> 0);
            };
            this.hashFnv32a = function (str, asString, seed) {
                /*jshint bitwise:false */
                var i, l,
                    hval = (seed === undefined) ? 0x811c9dc5 : seed;

                for (i = 0, l = str.length; i < l; i++) {
                    hval ^= str.charCodeAt(i);
                    hval += (hval << 1) + (hval << 4) + (hval << 7) + (hval << 8) + (hval << 24);
                }
                if (asString) {
                    // Convert to 8 digit hex string
                    return ("0000000" + (hval >>> 0).toString(16)).substr(-8);
                }
                return hval >>> 0;
            };
            this.hashCode = function (s) {
                var h = 0, l = s.length, i = 0;
                if (l > 0)
                    while (i < l)
                        h = (h << 5) - h + s.charCodeAt(i++) | 0;
                return h;
            };
            this.autoPastCoupon = function (couponCode, inputElement) {
                try {
                    const nativeInputValueSetter = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(window.HTMLInputElement.prototype, 'value').set;
                    nativeInputValueSetter.call(inputElement, couponCode);

                    inputElement.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', {
                        view: document,
                        bubbles: true,
                        cancelable: true
                    }));
                }
                catch (ex) {
                    console.log("Error in autoPastCoupon code. Error : ", ex);
                }
            }
            this.getVisitorId = function () {
                const customKeyObj = localStorage.getItem("z1_cust_key") ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("z1_cust_key")) : {};
                z1log("getVisitorId customKeyObj : ", customKeyObj);
                const visitorId = customKeyObj && customKeyObj.visitorId ? customKeyObj.visitorId : util.getCookie('sti');
                z1log("getVisitorId visitorId : ", visitorId);
                return visitorId ? visitorId + '' : '';
            }
        };

        z.DataLayerHelper = function () {
            try {
                return {
                    gtm: function (callback, dlVarName = 'dataLayer') {
                        hookGtmDataLayer(dlVarName);
                        z1log("gtm datalayer listener attached");
                        if (!callback) {
                            z1log("callback not provided!");
                        }
                        window.addEventListener('z1_datalayerpush', event => {
                            let { eventData, dlIndex } = event.detail;
                            let eventName = eventData && "event" in eventData ? eventData.event : "";
                            // z1log('dataLayer ', eventName, eventData, dlIndex);
                            callback(event);
                        });
                    },
                    tealium: function (callback) {
                        this.isInitialized = false;
                        hookTeamliumDataLayer();
                        z1log("tealium utag_data listener attached");

                        window.addEventListener('utagdatalayerpush', event => {
                            z1log("within window.addEventListener for utagdatalayerpush");
                            callback(event);
                        });
                    },
                    digitalData: function (callback, dlVarName = 'digitalData') {
                        hookDigitalData(dlVarName);
                        if (!callback) {
                            z1log("callback not provided!");
                        }
                        window.addEventListener('z1_digitaldatapush', event => {
                            let { eventData, dlIndex } = event.detail;
                            let eventName = eventData && "event" in eventData ? eventData.event : "";
                            // z1log('dataLayer ', eventName, eventData, dlIndex);
                            callback(event);
                        });
                    }
                };
            } catch (error) {
                z1log('Error in DataLayerHelper: ', error);
            }
        };

        const util = new z1taglib.Util();

        z.CommonEventData = function (cartProducts, loggedInStatus) {
            this.cart = cartProducts;
            this.logged_in = loggedInStatus;
        };

        const Z1Event = function (eventName, commonEventData, additionalData) {
            this.eventName = eventName;
            this.commonEventData = commonEventData;
            this.additionalData = additionalData;
            this.send = () => {
                let eventData = {
                    ...this.commonEventData,
                    ...this.additionalData
                };
                const pushEvent = new CustomEvent("z1_" + this.eventName, {
                    detail: eventData,
                });
                window.dispatchEvent(pushEvent);
                util.pushEvent(this.eventName, eventData);
            };
        };


        z.EventEnum = {
            HOME: 'view_home',
            CATEGORY: 'view_category',
            PRODUCT_QUICK_VIEW: 'view_product',
            PRODUCT: 'view_product',
            SKUVIEW: 'select_sku',
            SEARCH: 'search',
            VIEWCART: 'view_cart',
            ADD_TO_BAG: 'add_to_cart',
            UPDATE_QUANTITY: 'update_cart',
            REMOVE_FROM_BAG: 'update_cart',
            CHECKOUT: 'begin_checkout',
            SHIPPING: 'add_shipping_info',
            PAYMENT: 'add_payment_info',
            PLACEDORDER: 'purchase'
        };

        z.RTOIdentifierToAnalyticsEventMap = {
            SHOWN: "offer_shown",
            NOTSHOWN: "offer_notshown",
            APPLIED: "offer_applied",
            COPIED: "offer_copied",
            REDEEMED: "offer_redeemed",
            CLOSED: "offer_closed",
        }

        z.EventFactory = function () {
            this.sendEvent = (eventKey, commonEventData, additionalData) => {
                // z1log("EF:", eventKey, commonEventData, additionalData);
                (new Z1Event(eventKey, commonEventData, additionalData)).send();
            };
        };

        //Simple publish subsribe lib using browser event
        z.PublishSubscribe = function () {
            let self = this;
            self.e = {};
            self.publish = function (name, detail) {
                //(self.e[name] = self.e[name] || new Event(name)).detail = detail;
                const pushEvent = new CustomEvent(name, { detail });
                window.dispatchEvent(pushEvent);
            };

            self.subscribe = function (name, handler, context) {
                // z1log("Subcribing to event", name, handler);
                window.addEventListener(name, handler.bind(context));
            };

            self.unsubscribe = function (name, handler, context) {
                window.removeEventListener(name, handler.bind(context));
            };
        };
        z.pubsub = new z.PublishSubscribe();
        z.Analytics = function (pubsub) {
            let self = this;
            self.subscribeTo = function (eventName) {
                pubsub.subscribe(eventName, function (e) {
                    let { identifier, useCaseName, actionName } = { ...e.detail };
                    self.getDataAndFireAnalytics(identifier, useCaseName, actionName);
                });
            };
            //this can be overidden if required for different customer basis
            self.getData = function (identifier, useCaseName, actionName) {
                let cartItems = localStorage.getItem("z1_cartProducts")
                    ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("z1_cartProducts"))
                    : {};
                cartItems = Object.values(util.convertObjectValuesToString(cartItems));
                let cartValue = cartItems.reduce(function (accumulator, currentItem) {
                    return (
                        accumulator +
                        Number(currentItem.quantity) * Number(currentItem.price)
                    );
                }, 0);
                return {
                    referrer: window.location.href,
                    cartValue: cartValue,
                    cartItems: JSON.stringify(cartItems),
                    useCaseName: useCaseName,
                    actionName: actionName,
                    identifier: identifier,
                };
            };

            self.fireAnalytics = function (dataObj) {
                //this is so that we create new copy incase if we need to do some modifications
                let z1EventData = {
                    ...dataObj,
                };

                util.pushEvent("uxanalytics", z1EventData);
            };

            self.fireAnalyticsEvent = function (identifier) {
                try {

                    let bannerConfigLocalKeys = ["z1_rto_banner_config"];
                    let bannerConfig = null;

                    for (let i = 0; i < bannerConfigLocalKeys.length; i++) {
                        let key = bannerConfigLocalKeys[i];
                        let localStorageValue = localStorage.getItem(key);

                        if (localStorageValue && util.isValid(localStorageValue)) {
                            try {
                                bannerConfig = JSON.parse(localStorageValue);
                                break;
                            } catch (e) { }
                        }
                    }

                    const rtoData = bannerConfig && bannerConfig.bannerData ? bannerConfig.bannerData : (bannerConfig ? bannerConfig : null);
                    const use_case_name = rtoData?.useCaseName || rtoData?.useCase || 'NA';
                    let cartItems = localStorage.getItem("z1_cartProducts") ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("z1_cartProducts")) : {};
                    cartItems = Object.values(util.convertObjectValuesToString(cartItems));
                    // z1log("rtoData : ", rtoData);
                    let analyticsObj = {};
                    if (util.isValid(rtoData)) {
                        analyticsObj.offer_code = rtoData.offerCode || 'NA';
                        analyticsObj.offer_value = rtoData.offerValue || 0;
                        analyticsObj.offer_type = rtoData.offerType || 'NA';
                        analyticsObj.offer_threshold = rtoData.offerThreshold || 0;
                        analyticsObj.te_id = rtoData.teId || 'NA';
                        analyticsObj.action_name = rtoData.actionName || 'NA';
                        analyticsObj.offer_id = rtoData.rowKeySuffix || 'NA';
                        analyticsObj.cart = JSON.stringify(cartItems) || '[]';
                        analyticsObj.usecase_name = use_case_name;
                    }
                    if (identifier in z.RTOIdentifierToAnalyticsEventMap) {
                        util.pushEvent(z.RTOIdentifierToAnalyticsEventMap[identifier], analyticsObj);

                        // Send data to Customer
                        let eventName = 'SessionAI_analytic';
                        let dataObj = {
                            "event": eventName,
                            "useCaseName": use_case_name,
                            "identifier": identifier,
                            "group": rtoData?.group || '',
                            "segment": localStorage.getItem("z1_eppLabel") || '',
                            "eventType": "CLICK",
                            "sti": util.getVisitorId(),
                            "customerID": digitalData?.user?.[0]?.segment?.biAccountId || '',
                            "pageURL": window.location.href,
                            "score": localStorage.getItem("z1_score") || 'NA',
                            "experienceShown": use_case_name,
                            "detail": {}
                        }
                        z1log("dataObj : ", dataObj);
                        if (identifier === 'APPLIED') {
                            eventName = 'SessionAI_Join_Now';
                            dataObj["event"] = 'SessionAI_Join_Now';
                            dataObj["identifier"] = 'CLICKED';
                            z1log("APPLIED dataObj : ", dataObj);
                        }

                        const analyticEvent = new CustomEvent(eventName, { detail: dataObj });
                        window.dispatchEvent(analyticEvent);
                    }
                }
                catch (ex) {
                    console.log("Error in fireAnalyticsEvent : ", ex);
                }
            }

            //facade of wrapping both the above functions. We can overide above two methods and use below one in code.
            self.getDataAndFireAnalytics = function (identifier, useCaseName, actionName, entityName, offerCode, additionalData) {
                let data = self.getData(identifier, useCaseName, actionName, entityName, offerCode);

                data = {
                    ...data,
                    ...additionalData
                };

                // self.fireAnalytics(data);
                // z1log("getDataAndFireAnalytics Data : ", data);
                self.fireAnalyticsEvent(identifier);
            };
        };

        z.analytics = new z.Analytics(z.pubsub); //initiliaze a namespace level analytics instance

        z.RTOBannerLifeCycle = {
            SHOWN: "SHOWN",
            NOTSHOWN: "NOTSHOWN",
            APPLIED: "APPLIED",
            COPIED: "COPIED",
            REDEEMED: "REDEEMED",
            EXPIRED: "EXPIRED",
            CLOSED: "CLOSED",
            SCORED: "SCORED"
        };
        z.Banner = function (bannerConfig, elem) {
            let self = this;
            self.state = "";
            self.bannerConfig = bannerConfig;
            self.elem = elem;
            self.render = function (customRender) {
                if (typeof customRender === "function") {
                    customRender(self);
                }
                z1log("Attaching click to close", util.isElement(self.elem));
                if (util.isElement(self.elem)) {
                    let closeBtn = self.elem.querySelector("#z1_closeBtn");

                    if (closeBtn) {
                        closeBtn.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
                            e.stopPropagation();
                            e.preventDefault();
                            self.close();
                        });
                    }

                    if (util.getDeviceType() == "phone") {
                        let greyArea = self.elem.querySelector("div#z1-rto-div.z1-fixed-container");
                        if (greyArea) {
                            greyArea.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
                                e.stopPropagation();
                                e.preventDefault();
                                self.close();
                            });
                        }
                    }
                }
                self.state = z.RTOBannerLifeCycle.SHOWN;
            };
            self.close = function (customClose) {
                let shouldPublish = true;
                self.state = z.RTOBannerLifeCycle.CLOSED;
                if (typeof customClose === "function") {
                    shouldPublish = customClose(self);
                }
                let z1WidgetDiv = document.getElementById(z.z1WidgetDivId);
                if (z1WidgetDiv) {
                    z1WidgetDiv.innerHTML = "";
                }
                shouldPublish =
                    shouldPublish == null ? true : shouldPublish + "" === "true";
                if (shouldPublish) {
                    let { useCaseName, actionName, offerCode, entityName } = { ...self.bannerConfig.bannerData };
                    z.pubsub.publish(z.RTOBannerLifeCycle.CLOSED, {
                        identifier: z.RTOBannerLifeCycle.CLOSED,
                        useCaseName,
                        actionName,
                        offerCode,
                        entityName
                    });
                }
            };
        };

        //init executions
        (function () {
            util.attachZ1RawDataHandler();
        })();
    } catch (ex) {
        console.error("z1taglib : ", ex);
    }
})(window.z1taglib = window.z1taglib || {});
}catch(e){console.log('ZineOne : Unable to execute script');} }</script><script type="text/javascript" data-id="z1s-tg-collectData_813">function collectData_813(){ try{
(function (z, undefined) {

    let QA = false;
    QA = localStorage.getItem("z1_qa") ? localStorage.getItem("z1_qa") === "true" : false;
    // if (!QA) {
    //     return false;
    // }

    const util = new z1taglib.Util();
    const dl = new z1taglib.DataLayerHelper();
    const eventEnum = z1taglib.EventEnum;
    const commonEventData = new z1taglib.CommonEventData();
    const eventFactory = new z1taglib.EventFactory();
    const cartLocalStorageName = "z1_cartProducts";
    const productDetailsKey = 'z1_productDetails';

    // Create Maps
    const addToCartProductFieldMap = {
        category: "category",
        sku: "skuId",
        product_id: "productId",
        list_price: "listPrice",
        price: "valuePrice",
        quantity: "quantity"
    };

    const cartViewOfProductFieldMap = {
        category: "category",
        sku: "sku",
        product_id: "product_id",
        list_price: "list_price",
        price: "price",
        quantity: "quantity"
    };

    const categoryCleanUp = (category = "") => {
        return encodeURIComponent(String(category).toLowerCase().trim());
    };

    const getCategoryValueFromURL = () => {
        let pathName = window?.location?.pathname || '';
        if (pathName.includes('/brand/')) { return 'brand'; }
        if (pathName.includes('/sale')) { return 'sale'; }
        if (pathName.includes('/beauty/')) { return 'beauty'; }
        return '';
    }

    const getCategoryValueFromBreadCrumbs = () => {
        const breadcrumbNav = document.querySelector('nav[aria-label="Breadcrumb"]');
        let breadcrumbItems = breadcrumbNav ? breadcrumbNav.querySelectorAll('li [data-comp="BaseComponent "]') : [];
        if (breadcrumbItems && breadcrumbItems.length === 0) {
            breadcrumbItems = breadcrumbNav ? breadcrumbNav.querySelectorAll('li > a[data-comp~="BaseComponent"]') : [];
        }
        const breadcrumbPath = Array.from(breadcrumbItems)
            .map(el => el?.innerText?.trim())
            .filter(text => !!text)
            .join('/');
        const category = breadcrumbPath ? categoryCleanUp(breadcrumbPath) : '';
        return category;
    }

    const getCategoryValueFromCartObject = (dataObj) => {
        try {
            const names = [];
            let current = dataObj;

            while (current?.displayName) {
                names.push(current.displayName);
                current = current.parentCategory;
            }

            let categoryValue = names.reverse().join('/');
            categoryValue = categoryValue ? categoryCleanUp(categoryValue) : '';
            return categoryValue
        } catch (e) {
            console.log("Errro in getCategoryValueFromCartObject e : ", e);
            return '';
        }
    };

    const getProductData = () => {
        const dataObj = digitalData?.product?.[0] || null;
        if (!dataObj) { return {}; }
        const productObj = {
            "category": getCategoryValueFromBreadCrumbs(),
            "product_id": (dataObj?.productInfo?.productID || '') + '',
            "sku": (dataObj?.attributes?.skuId || '') + '',
            "price": String(dataObj?.attributes?.price || '').replaceAll('$', '').trim(),
            "list_price": String(dataObj?.attributes?.originalPrice || '').replaceAll('$', '').trim(),
            "quantity": '1'
        }
        return productObj;
    }

    const getSearchQueryParameter = () => {
        const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
        return params.get('keyword') || '';
    };

    const findChangedOrNewItem = (oldArray, newArray) => {
        try {
            z1log("oldArray : ", oldArray);
            z1log("newArray : ", newArray);

            const oldMap = new Map(oldArray.map(item => [item.sku + '', { quantity: Number(item.quantity) }]));
            z1log("oldMap : ", oldMap);

            // Step 1: Check for quantity change
            const quantityChangedItem = newArray.find(item => {
                const oldItem = oldMap.get(item.skuId + '');
                return oldItem !== undefined && oldItem.quantity !== Number(item.quantity);
            });
            if (quantityChangedItem) return quantityChangedItem;

            // Step 2: Check for new items
            const newItem = newArray.find(item => !oldMap.has(item.skuId + ''));
            return newItem || null;
        } catch (e) {
            console.log("Errro in findChangedOrNewItem e : ", e);
            return null;
        }
    };

    const findRemovedItem = (baseArray, compareArray) => {
        try {
            z1log("baseArray : ", baseArray);
            z1log("compareArray : ", compareArray);
            const compareSkus = new Set(compareArray.map(item => item.skuId + ''));
            z1log("findRemovedItem compareSkus : ", compareSkus);
            return baseArray.find(item => !compareSkus.has(item.sku + '')) || null;
        } catch (e) {
            console.log("Errro in findRemovedItem e : ", e);
            return null;
        }
    };

    const buildCommonEventData = () => {
        currentUserObj.init();
        let currentUser = currentUserObj.info();
        commonEventData.cart = JSON.stringify(
            Object.values(util.convertObjectValuesToString(util.transformObjectArray(cart.get(), cartViewOfProductFieldMap)))
        );
        commonEventData.logged_in = currentUser.loggedInStatus;
        commonEventData.visitorId = currentUser.visitorId;
    };

    const setCustomerId = () => {
        currentUserObj.init();
        let currentUser = currentUserObj.info();
        if (currentUser.customerId && currentUser.customerId !== '') {
            window.ZineOne && ZineOne.setCustomerId(currentUser.customerId);
        }
    };

    function Cart(cartLocalStorageKey = cartLocalStorageName) {
        this.init = () => { this.cartProducts = {}; };

        this.displayCart = () => { z1log(JSON.stringify(this.cartProducts)); };

        this.get = () => {
            this.cartProducts = localStorage.getItem(cartLocalStorageKey) ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(cartLocalStorageKey)) : {};
            return this.cartProducts;
        };

        this.add = (productObj) => {
            try {
                this.get();
                if (productObj && util.isValid(productObj["sku"]) && productObj["sku"] != "") {
                    if (!(productObj["sku"] in this.cartProducts)) {
                        this.cartProducts[productObj["sku"]] = productObj;
                    } else {
                        this.cartProducts[productObj["sku"]]["quantity"] = Number(this.cartProducts[productObj["sku"]]["quantity"]) + Number(productObj.quantity);
                    }
                    localStorage.setItem(cartLocalStorageKey, JSON.stringify(this.cartProducts));
                    buildCommonEventData();
                    eventFactory.sendEvent(eventEnum.ADD_TO_BAG, commonEventData, { items: JSON.stringify([productObj]) });
                }
            } catch (e) {
                console.log("Errro in add e : ", e);
                return '';
            }
        };

        this.reSyncCart = () => {
            try {
                const digitalDataCart = digitalData?.cart?.itemsByBasket?.[0]?.items || [];
                const cartProducts = this.get();
                z1log("Before resyncing cart : ", cartProducts);
                this.cartProducts = {};

                digitalDataCart.forEach(item => {
                    let quantity = item?.qty || 1;
                    let dataObj = item?.sku || '';
                    if (dataObj && dataObj.skuId && dataObj.skuId !== '') {
                        let categoryValue = dataObj.parentCategory ? getCategoryValueFromCartObject(dataObj.parentCategory) : '';
                        this.cartProducts[dataObj.skuId] = {
                            "product_id": (dataObj?.productId || '') + '',
                            "sku": (dataObj?.skuId || '') + '',
                            "quantity": (Number(this.cartProducts[dataObj.skuId]?.["quantity"] || 0) + Number(quantity)) + '',
                            "price": String(dataObj?.valuePrice || '').replaceAll('$', ''),
                            "list_price": String(dataObj?.listPrice || '').replaceAll('$', ''),
                            "category": cartProducts?.[dataObj.skuId]?.['category'] || categoryValue
                        }
                        // console.log("Sku : ", this.cartProducts[dataObj.skuId]["sku"], ' | quantity = ', this.cartProducts[dataObj.skuId]["quantity"]);
                    }
                });

                z1log("After resyncing cart :", this.cartProducts);
                localStorage.setItem(cartLocalStorageKey, JSON.stringify(this.cartProducts));
            } catch (e) {
                console.log("Errro in resyncart e : ", e);
                return '';
            }
        };

        this.clear = () => {
            this.cartProducts = {};
            localStorage.setItem(cartLocalStorageKey, JSON.stringify(this.cartProducts));
        };

        this.init();
    }

    function User() {
        let loggedInStatus = 'N';
        let customerId = '';
        let visitorId = '';

        //private methods
        const getCustomerId = () => {
            try {
                // const user_id = digitalData?.user?.[0]?.profile?.[0]?.profileInfo?.profileID || '';
                const user_id = digitalData?.user?.[0]?.segment?.biAccountId || '';
                if (user_id) { customerId = user_id; }
                return customerId;
            } catch (e) {
                z1log("Error occurred from getCustomerId:", e);
            }
        };
        const getLoggedInStatus = () => {
            try {
                // const user_id = digitalData?.user?.[0]?.profile?.[0]?.profileInfo?.profileID || '';
                const user_id = digitalData?.user?.[0]?.segment?.biAccountId || '';
                if (user_id) { loggedInStatus = 'Y'; }
                return loggedInStatus;
            } catch (e) {
                z1log("Error occurred from getLoggedInStatus:", e);
            }
        };
        const getVisitorId = () => {
            try {
                const stiValue = util.getCookie('sti');
                z1log("getVisitorId stiValue : ", stiValue);

                if (util.isValid(stiValue) && stiValue !== "" && window.ZineOne) {
                    z1log("Setting customKey", stiValue);
                    ZineOne.setCustomKey("visitorId", stiValue);
                    visitorId = stiValue;
                }
                return visitorId;
            }
            catch (e) {
                z1log("Error occurred from getVisitorId:", e);
            }
        };

        this.init = () => {
            getLoggedInStatus();
            getVisitorId();
            if (loggedInStatus === 'Y') { getCustomerId(); }
        };

        this.info = () => { return { loggedInStatus, customerId, visitorId }; };

        //run on new instance
        this.init();
    }

    // TODO: Create the Path interface
    function Page(name, path) {
        this.name = name;
        this.path = path;
        this.category = '';
        this.data = null;
        // Abstract method
        this.sendEvent = () => { };
    }

    // Create the object of the user
    let currentUserObj = new User();

    // Create the object of a cart
    let cart = new Cart();

    // -------------------- Objects for handling different pages ------------------ //

    const homePage = new Page(eventEnum.HOME, '/');
    homePage.sendEvent = util.debounce(function () {
        buildCommonEventData();
        eventFactory.sendEvent(homePage.name, commonEventData);
    }, 300);

    const categoryPage = new Page(eventEnum.CATEGORY, "/category")
    categoryPage.sendEvent = util.debounce(function (categoryName) {
        buildCommonEventData();
        eventFactory.sendEvent(categoryPage.name, commonEventData, { category: categoryName });
    }, 300);

    const searchPage = new Page(eventEnum.SEARCH, '/search');
    searchPage.sendEvent = util.debounce(function (searchTerm) {
        buildCommonEventData();
        eventFactory.sendEvent(searchPage.name, commonEventData, { search_term: searchTerm });
    }, 300);

    const productPage = new Page(eventEnum.PRODUCT, '/product');
    productPage.sendEvent = util.debounce(function (productDetails) {
        buildCommonEventData();
        eventFactory.sendEvent(productPage.name, commonEventData, util.convertObjectValuesToString(productDetails));
    }, 300);

    const cartPage = new Page(eventEnum.VIEWCART, '/cart');
    cartPage.sendEvent = util.debounce(function () {
        buildCommonEventData();
        eventFactory.sendEvent(cartPage.name, commonEventData);
    }, 300);

    // TODO: Create pageMaps and and the different 
    const pageMaps = {
        '/': () => {
            homePage.sendEvent();
        },
        '/category': () => {
            let category = getCategoryValueFromBreadCrumbs();
            if (category === '') {
                category = getCategoryValueFromURL();
            }
            categoryPage.sendEvent(category);
        },
        '/search': () => {
            const searchTerm = getSearchQueryParameter();
            searchPage.sendEvent(searchTerm);
        },
        '/product': () => {
            const productDetails = getProductData() || {};
            productPage.sendEvent(productDetails);
            localStorage.setItem(productDetailsKey, JSON.stringify(productDetails));
        },
        '/cart': () => {
            localStorage.removeItem(productDetailsKey);
            cartPage.sendEvent();
            cart.reSyncCart();
        }
    };

    const addEventListenerOnQtyChange = (sku = '') => {
        if (!sku) return;
        const elementId = 'qty_' + sku;
        // z1log("elementId :", elementId);
        const quantityElement = document.getElementById(elementId);
        // z1log("quantityElement :", quantityElement);
        if (quantityElement) {
            quantityElement.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
                const newQty = e?.target?.value || 1;
                // z1log("newQty : ", newQty);
                const productObj = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(productDetailsKey) || '{}');
                z1log("productObj :", productObj);
                const skuId = (productObj?.sku || '') + '';
                z1log("skuId :", skuId);
                if (skuId && sku === skuId) {
                    productObj["quantity"] = newQty + '';
                    localStorage.setItem(productDetailsKey, JSON.stringify(productObj));
                    z1log("Qty updated productObj :", productObj);
                }
            });
        }
    }

    const dlDigitalDataListener = (event) => {
        let { eventData, dlIndex } = event.detail;
        eventData = eventData?.eventInfo || {};
        let eventName = "eventName" in eventData ? eventData.eventName : eventData[0] === "eventName" ? eventData[1] : "";
        const pathName = window?.location?.pathname || '';
        z1log("digitalData_dl :", eventData, eventName);

        let internalEventName = String(eventData?.attributes?.eventName || '').toLowerCase().trim();
        let linkName = String(eventData?.attributes?.linkName || '').toLowerCase().trim();
        // z1log("internalEventName :", internalEventName, ' | linkName :', linkName);

        // Quick view
        if (eventName === 'asyncPageLoad' && internalEventName && internalEventName === "quicklookload") {
            const eventProductId = (eventData?.attributes?.productId || '') + '';
            z1log("eventProductId :", eventProductId);
            const productObj = getProductData();
            z1log("productObj :", productObj);
            const sku = (productObj?.sku || '') + '';
            z1log("sku :", sku);
            const productId = (productObj?.product_id || '') + '';
            z1log("productId :", productId);
            if (eventProductId && productId && eventProductId === productId) {
                buildCommonEventData();
                eventFactory.sendEvent(eventEnum.PRODUCT_QUICK_VIEW, commonEventData, util.convertObjectValuesToString(productObj));
                localStorage.setItem(productDetailsKey, JSON.stringify(productObj));
            }
            addEventListenerOnQtyChange(sku);
        }

        // Sku change from Quick View
        if (eventName === "linkTrackingEvent" && linkName && linkName === "quicklook_swatch_click") {
            const productObj = getProductData();
            z1log("productObj :", productObj);
            buildCommonEventData();
            eventFactory.sendEvent(eventEnum.SKUVIEW, commonEventData, util.convertObjectValuesToString(productObj));
            localStorage.setItem(productDetailsKey, JSON.stringify(productObj));
        }

        // Sku change from Product Page
        if (eventName === "SOTLinkTracking" && linkName && linkName === "product alt image swatch size") {
            const eventProductId = (eventData?.attributes?.productId || '') + '';
            z1log("eventProductId :", eventProductId);
            const productObj = getProductData();
            z1log("productObj :", productObj);
            const productId = (productObj?.product_id || '') + '';
            z1log("productId :", productId);
            if (eventProductId && productId && eventProductId === productId) {
                buildCommonEventData();
                eventFactory.sendEvent(eventEnum.SKUVIEW, commonEventData, util.convertObjectValuesToString(productObj));
                localStorage.setItem(productDetailsKey, JSON.stringify(productObj));
            }
        }

        // Add to cart from quick view or product page
        if (eventName === "linkTrackingEvent" && linkName && linkName === "add to basket") {
            z1log("START ADD TO BASKET");
            const eventSkuId = (eventData?.attributes?.skuId || '') + '';
            // z1log("eventSkuId :", eventSkuId);
            const productObj = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(productDetailsKey) || '{}');
            // z1log("productObj :", productObj);
            const sku = (productObj?.sku || '') + '';
            // z1log("sku :", sku);
            let quantity = (productObj?.quantity || 1) + '';
            // z1log("quantity :", quantity);
            if (pathName.includes('/product/')) {
                const elementId = 'qty_' + sku;
                // z1log("elementId :", elementId);
                const quantityElement = document.getElementById(elementId);
                // z1log("quantityElement :", quantityElement);
                quantity = quantityElement ? quantityElement.value : (quantity || 1);
                // z1log("quantity :", quantity);
                productObj["quantity"] = quantity + '';
            }

            if (pathName === '/basket') {
                cart.reSyncCart();
                const sku = eventData?.attributes?.skuId || '';
                z1log("Add to basket => sku :", sku);
                if (!sku) return;
                const cartItems = cart.get();
                z1log("Add to basket => cartItems :", cartItems);
                const addedProduct = cartItems && cartItems[sku] ? cartItems[sku] : {};
                z1log("Add to basket => addedProduct :", addedProduct);
                cart.add(addedProduct);
            }

            if (eventSkuId && sku && eventSkuId === sku) {
                cart.add(productObj);
            }
            localStorage.setItem(productDetailsKey, JSON.stringify(productObj));
            z1log("END ADD TO BASKET");
        }

        // Fire update cart event on quantity increase from cart page.
        if (eventName === "linkTrackingEvent" && linkName && (linkName === "basket:edit quantity:increase" || linkName === "basket:edit quantity:decrease" || linkName === "remove from basket")) {

            // Get existing cart item details
            const cartItems = cart.get();
            const cartProductsObj = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(cartItems));
            const cartProductsArray = Object.values(util.convertObjectValuesToString(util.transformObjectArray(cartProductsObj, cartViewOfProductFieldMap)));
            z1log("cartpage cartProductsArray : ", cartProductsArray);

            // Get latest updated cart item details
            const digitalDataCartArray = digitalData?.cart?.itemsByBasket?.[0]?.items || [];
            z1log("cartpage currentCartItemsArray : ", digitalDataCartArray);
            const processedDigitalDataCartArray = digitalDataCartArray.map(item => ({
                ...item.sku,
                "quantity": (item?.qty || 1) + ''
            }));
            z1log("cartpage processedDigitalDataCartArray : ", processedDigitalDataCartArray);

            cart.reSyncCart();

            if (linkName === "basket:edit quantity:increase" || linkName === "basket:edit quantity:decrease") {
                let updatedProductObj = findChangedOrNewItem(cartProductsArray, processedDigitalDataCartArray);
                // z1log("1 updatedProductObj : ", updatedProductObj);
                if (updatedProductObj) {
                    updatedProductObj = util.transformObject(updatedProductObj, addToCartProductFieldMap);
                    // z1log("2 updatedProductObj : ", updatedProductObj);
                    const cartProducts = cart.get();
                    // z1log("cartProducts : ", cartProducts);
                    const skuId = updatedProductObj["sku"] || '';
                    // z1log("skuId : ", skuId);
                    updatedProductObj = cartProducts?.[skuId] || {};
                    z1log("updatedProductObj from cartProducts : ", updatedProductObj);
                    buildCommonEventData();
                    eventFactory.sendEvent(eventEnum.UPDATE_QUANTITY, commonEventData, { items: JSON.stringify([updatedProductObj]) });
                }
            }

            // Fire update cart event on removing item from cart page.
            if (eventName === "linkTrackingEvent" && linkName && linkName === "remove from basket") {
                let removedProductObj = findRemovedItem(cartProductsArray, processedDigitalDataCartArray);
                if (!removedProductObj) return;
                z1log("dl_view_cart removedProductObj : ", removedProductObj);
                const skuId = removedProductObj["sku"] || '';
                removedProductObj["category"] = cartProductsObj?.[skuId]?.["category"] || categoryCleanUp(removedProductObj["category"]);
                buildCommonEventData();
                eventFactory.sendEvent(eventEnum.REMOVE_FROM_BAG, commonEventData, { items: JSON.stringify([removedProductObj]) });
                return;
            }
        }
    };

    const dlGtmListener = (event) => {
        let { eventData } = event.detail;
        let eventName = "event" in eventData ? eventData.event : eventData[0] === "event" ? eventData[1] : "";
        // z1log("dlGtmListener eventName :", eventName);
        if (eventName === 'page_view') {
            // z1log("executePageLoadMethods called");
            executePageLoadMethods(window.location.pathname);
        }
    };

    const executePageLoadMethods = util.debounce(async (currentPagePath = '') => {
        let currentPagePathRoot = "";
        currentPagePath = String(currentPagePath).toLowerCase().trim();

        if (!currentPagePath || String(currentPagePath) === "") { return; }
        // z1log("currentPagePath : ", currentPagePath);

        if (currentPagePath === '/') { currentPagePathRoot = '/'; }
        if (currentPagePath.includes('/shop/')) { currentPagePathRoot = '/category'; }
        if (currentPagePath.includes('/brand/')) { currentPagePathRoot = '/category'; }
        if (currentPagePath.includes('/sale')) { currentPagePathRoot = '/category'; }
        if (currentPagePath.includes('/beauty/')) { currentPagePathRoot = '/category'; }
        if (currentPagePath.includes('/search')) { currentPagePathRoot = '/search'; }
        if (currentPagePath.includes('/product/')) { currentPagePathRoot = '/product'; }
        if (currentPagePath.includes('/basket')) { currentPagePathRoot = '/cart'; }
        if (pageMaps[currentPagePathRoot]) { pageMaps[currentPagePathRoot](); }
    });

    //on load code executions
    (async () => {
        setCustomerId();
        dl.gtm(dlGtmListener);
        dl.digitalData(dlDigitalDataListener);
    })();
})(window.z1taglib = window.z1taglib || {});

<script>
var getPriceAsInt = function(price) {
    if (isNaN(parseFloat(price))) {
        return price;
    }
    // Remove currency symbol and commas
    price = price.match(/\d+(?:\.\d+|\,\d+\.\d+|\,\d+)|\d+/)[0];
    price = price.replace(',', '');
    price = Sephora.analytics.utils.convertToUSD(price);
    return parseFloat(price);
};

window.addEventListener('PromocodeRedeemed', function() {
    if (braze) {
        braze.logCustomEvent('promocodeRedeemed');
    }
});

var trackPurchases = function() {
    var items = digitalData.transaction.item;
    var birthdayGiftRedemmed = false;
    var birhdayGitfProductId = '';
    for (var i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
        var currentItem = items[i];
        braze.logPurchase(currentItem.sku.productId, getPriceAsInt(currentItem.sku.listPrice), 'USD', currentItem.qty);
        if (currentItem.sku.biType === 'Birthday Gift') {
            birthdayGiftRedemmed = true;
            birhdayGitfProductId = currentItem.sku.productId;
        }
    }

    if (birthdayGiftRedemmed) {
        braze.logCustomEvent('BirthdayGiftRedeemed',
            { 'productId': birhdayGitfProductId }
        )
    }
};

// Acquisition Functions
var getUrlParameter = function(name) {
    name = name.replace(/[\[]/, '\\[').replace(/[\]]/, '\\]');
    var regex = new RegExp('[\\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)');
    var results = regex.exec(location.search);
    return results === null ? '' : decodeURIComponent(results[1].replace(/\+/g, ' '));
};

var isPaidReferrer = function(omMmcParam) {
    const paidReferrers = ['ppc', 'us_search', 'ca_search', 'google', 'ytsrch', 'gsp', 'esv'];

    for (var i=0; i < paidReferrers.length; i++){
        if (omMmcParam.indexOf(paidReferrers[i]) !== -1) {
            return true;
        }
    }
};

window.addEventListener('postPageLoad', function() {
  
  var localRE = /local.*sephora.com/;
  var QaRE = /qa.*sephora.com/;
  var environment = QaRE.test(location.hostname) || localRE.test(location.hostname) ? 'staging' : 'production';
  var apiKey = {
      staging: 'c8a4108b-1bbc-48d3-b502-f5acad999b78',
      production: '476615b3-3386-4e1c-a9fd-7e174eb9b8de'
  };
  var baseUrl = 'sdk.iad-01.braze.com';

  // Start - Load Braze SDK
  +function(a,p,P,b,y){a.braze={};a.brazeQueue=[];for(var s="BrazeSdkMetadata DeviceProperties Card Card.prototype.dismissCard Card.prototype.removeAllSubscriptions Card.prototype.removeSubscription InAppMessageButton.prototype.removeSubscription InAppMessageButton.prototype.subscribeToClickedEvent FeatureFlag FeatureFlag.prototype.getStringProperty FeatureFlag.prototype.getNumberProperty FeatureFlag.prototype.getBooleanProperty automaticallyShowInAppMessages destroyFeed hideContentCards showContentCards showFeed showInAppMessage toggleContentCards toggleFeed changeUser destroy window.braze.ContentCards};window.braze.getCachedFeed=function(){return new window.braze.Feed};window.braze.getUser=function(){return new window.braze.User};window.braze.getFeatureFlag=function(){return new window.braze.FeatureFlag};(y=p.createElement(P)).type='text/javascript';y.src='https://js.appboycdn.com/web-sdk/4.7/braze.min.js';y.async=1;(b=p.getElementsByTagName(P)[0]).parentNode.insertBefore(y,b)}(window,document,'script');
  // END - Load Braze SDK
  
  braze.initialize(apiKey[environment], {
      enableLogging: false,
      enableHtmlInAppMessages: true,
      safariWebsitePushId: 'web.com.sephora',
      baseUrl: baseUrl
  });
  
  braze.automaticallyShowInAppMessages();
  
  /*
  Poll braze.isPushPermissionGranted b/c braze.isPushPermissionGranted()
  is unreliable, returns true first then false afterward. If after 1
  second it's still true, then trust it's true. If it ever returns false,
  immediately trust it's false & show opt-in message if not already shown
  this session.
  */
  tryToCallRegisterAppboyMessages = function (tries) {
      if (!braze.isPushPermissionGranted()) {
          // Prevent opt-in messages from showing on every page load
          if (!(window.sessionStorage && window.sessionStorage.getItem("brazePromptWasShownThisSession"))) {
              if(window.sessionStorage) {
                window.sessionStorage.setItem("brazePromptWasShownThisSession", "true");
              }
              braze.requestPushPermission()
          }
      } else {
          if (tries === 10) {
              // isPushPermissionGranted really is true, so allow popups to show
              braze.requestPushPermission()
          } else {
              // Wait a tenth of a second and then check again
              window.setTimeout(function(){
                  tryToCallRegisterAppboyMessages(++tries);
              }, 100);
          }
      }
  };
  
  // Determine whether
  tryToCallRegisterAppboyMessages(1);
  
  // If we haven't already cached the data, cache it
  if (window.sessionStorage && window.sessionStorage.getItem('lastDataForBraze') === null) {
      var stubData = {
          'user_id': '',
      };
      window.sessionStorage.setItem('lastDataForBraze', JSON.stringify(stubData));
  }

  var cachedData = window.sessionStorage.getItem('lastDataForBraze');
  var jsonCachedData = JSON.parse(cachedData);
  var isJsonUpdated = false;

  var isNewData = function(key, value) {
      var cachedData = window.sessionStorage.getItem('lastDataForBraze');
      var jsonCachedData = JSON.parse(cachedData);
      if (jsonCachedData[key] !== value) {
          return true;
      }
      return false;
  };

  var setNewData = function(key, value) {
      if (isNewData(key, value)) {
          isJsonUpdated = true;
          jsonCachedData[key] = value;
          return true;
      }
      return false;
  };

  var userData = null;
  var profileStatus = 0;
  var birthDay = null;
  var birthMonth = null;
  var birthYear = null;
  var vibSpendingForYear = null;
  var biPoints = 0;
  var subscriptionPrograms = null;
  var isEnrolledInFlash = null;
  var flashEndDate = null;
  var flashCancelDate = null;
  var SHORTENED_MONTHS = ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec'];

  function formatFlashDate(date) {
      var dateArray = date.split('/');
      var month = SHORTENED_MONTHS[parseInt(dateArray[0]) - 1];
      var day = dateArray[1];
      var year = '20' + dateArray[2];
      return month + ' ' + day + ' ' + year;
  }

  // Get cached representation of user data
  if (window.localStorage && window.localStorage.getItem('UserData')) {
      userData = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('UserData'));
      userData = userData.data;
  }
  
  if (userData !== null) {
    if (userData.profile) {
        if (userData.profile.beautyInsiderAccount) {
            var bi = userData.profile.beautyInsiderAccount;
            if (bi !== null) {
                birthDay = bi.birthDay;
                birthMonth = bi.birthMonth;
                birthYear = bi.birthYear;
                vibSpendingForYear = bi.vibSpendingForYear ? bi.vibSpendingForYear : null;
                biPoints = bi.promotionPoints ? bi.promotionPoints : 0;
            }
        }
        subscriptionPrograms = userData.profile.subscriptionPrograms || null;
        if (subscriptionPrograms) {
            if (subscriptionPrograms.flash) {
                isEnrolledInFlash =  subscriptionPrograms.flash.isActive === true;
                flashEndDate = subscriptionPrograms.flash.endDate ? formatFlashDate(subscriptionPrograms.flash.endDate) : null;
                flashCancelDate = subscriptionPrograms.flash.cancelDate ? formatFlashDate(subscriptionPrograms.flash.cancelDate) : null;
            }
        }
    }
    profileStatus = userData.profile && userData.profile.profileStatus ? userData.profile.profileStatus : 0;
  }

  var atgId = digitalData.user[0].profile[0].profileInfo.profileID;
  
  // Warning: Use pageInfoCountry, because country is already defined as a variable by appboy
  var pageCountryLang = digitalData.page.pageInfo && digitalData.page.pageInfo.country === 'CA' ?
      digitalData.page.pageInfo.language === 'FR' ? 'fr_CA' : 'en_CA' : 'en_US';
  
  /*
  If you have a unique identifier for this user (e.g. they are logged
  into your site) it's a good idea to call changeUser here. See
  https://js.appboycdn.com/web-sdk/latest/doc/module-braze.html#.changeUser
  for more information. Do not send atgId for anonymous users.
  */
  if (atgId !== '') {
      if(setNewData('user_id', atgId)) {
          braze.changeUser(atgId);
      }
  }

  var abUser = braze.getUser();

  if (setNewData('clientLocale', pageCountryLang)) {
      abUser.setCustomUserAttribute('clientLocale', pageCountryLang);
  }
  if (profileStatus > 0 && birthYear !== null && birthYear !== '1800') {
      if (setNewData('birth', birthYear+birthMonth+birthDay)) {
          abUser.setDateOfBirth(parseInt(birthYear), parseInt(birthMonth), parseInt(birthDay));
      }
  }

  if (isJsonUpdated) {
      var stringCachedData = JSON.stringify(jsonCachedData);
      window.sessionStorage.setItem('lastDataForBraze', stringCachedData);
  }

  // Track Purchases
  if (digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName === 'order-confirmation') {
      trackPurchases();
  }

  // Track view of Rewards Bazaar page: /rewards
  if (digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName === 'rewards bazaar') {
      braze.logCustomEvent('bazaarPageView');
  }

  braze.subscribeToInAppMessage(function(inAppMessage) {
      var shouldDisplay = true;
    
    console.log('Just entered subscribeToInAppMessage', inAppMessage);

      // If Sephora modal is open, then do not show Braze modal
      var modalRoot = document.getElementById('modal-root');
      if (modalRoot !== null) {
          if (modalRoot.children.length > 0) {
              shouldDisplay = false;
          }
      }

      if (inAppMessage[0] instanceof braze.ab.InAppMessage) {
            console.log('Is inAppMessage[0] instance of braze.ab.InAppMessage?', inAppMessage[0] instanceof braze.ab.InAppMessage);

          // Read the key-value pair for msg-id
          var msgId = inAppMessage[0].extras["msg-id"];
          // If this is our push primer message
          if (msgId == "push-primer") {
              // We don't want to display the soft push prompt to users on browsers that don't support push, or if the user
              // has already granted/blocked permission
              if (!braze.isPushSupported() || braze.isPushPermissionGranted() || braze.isPushBlocked()) {
                  shouldDisplay = false;
              }
              if (inAppMessage[0].buttons[0] !== null) {
                  // Prompt the user when the first button is clicked
                  inAppMessage[0].buttons[0].subscribeToClickedEvent(function() {
                      braze.requestPushPermission();
                  });
              }
          }
      }

      // Display the message
      if (shouldDisplay) {
          console.log('Will it run braze.display.showInAppMessage(inAppMessage[0]) based on shouldDisplay?', shouldDisplay);

          braze.display.showInAppMessage(inAppMessage[0]);
      }
  });
  
  braze.openSession();
  
  // Allow Sephora code to proceed with Braze actions
  if (Sephora.analytics.resolvePromises.brazeIsReady) {
      Sephora.analytics.resolvePromises.brazeIsReady();
  }
});

(function (window){
    /**
     * Copyright (c) 2013, Visual IQ Inc. All Rights Reserved.

	 /*
	 	QP is Query Parameter.
	 */
	var CONFIG = {
	 SEARCH_ENGINES : {
		GOOGLE : {
			NAME : "Google",
			QP : "q",
			HOST : "google"
		},

		YAHOO : {
			NAME : "Yahoo",
			QP : "p",
			HOST : "yahoo"

			QP : "q",
			HOST : "bing"

		ASK : {
			NAME : "Ask",
			QP : "q",
